Chains of Death.name: Chains of Death
Chains of Death.flavor: Deadly necrotic energy binds your foe where it stands.
Chains of Death.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier necrotic damage, and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn.

False Life.name: False Life
False Life.flavor: You draw the life force from your opponent, gathering it to yourself and gaining a temporary boost of vitality.
False Life.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your level + your Wisdom modifier. If you have hit an enemy since the end of your last turn, you instead gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Wisdom modifier.

Endbringer.name: Endbringer
Endbringer.flavor: Writhing dark energy, the precursor of an apocalypse, tears at your foe.
Endbringer.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 15 necrotic damage and is blinded (save ends both).
Endbringer.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends).
